Windlord/Termitron:

Termitron lost in darkness (is still night?). Windlord screamed 
him "Wait Wait come here TERMITRON!!! What's goind on???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> The Hero: Ouch, damn, that hurt. Hey, people, can somebody put my 
head back
> on? Hmm?
> 
> Technosis walks out of the base. Feeling guilty that she did 
nothing at all.
> Suddenly, Termitron had run by screaming about someone's death, or
> something.
> 
> Technosis: Who's dead? Who's dead? Who's dead?
> 
> The Hero: Hey!
> 
> Technosis: Everyone had better get to a CR Chamber, fast. We have 
four,
> after all.
> 
> Technosis puts The Hero's head back on.
> 
> The Hero: I ran him off.
> 
> The Hero smiles and mech fluid runs down his neck. Then he frowns. 
Technosis
> picks up Perplex. He wasn't that big, but Technosis was smaller, so 
she had
> a little trouble, but she took him inside and put him into a CR 
Chamber.
> Technosis walked back out.
> 
> The Hero: Ouch, ouch, ouch.
> 
> Technosis: I put Perplex in a CR Chamber, we still have 3 CR 
Chambers
> open...
>
